channel.title: [508] Max hits/Spec Damage Increase/ etc
channel.description:
Hi and welcome to my topic. :confused:
My problem is the following: :|
When i do a special attack, lets say with an armadyl godsword, i will almost always hit 0. I want to make it so i always hit at least 50 and max 80. ;)
I would also increase the normal max hit of weapon X to hit Y so it will range from 0-Y. Also i'd like to increas accurary of the hits, so i hit more.
I've already searched all my files but cant seem to find a part where i can edit a number to increase the accurary or max hit..
Can anyone help me?
IF SOMEONE CAN FIX THIS: MOD ON MY SERVER + REP++
kthxbai :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 02:57:39 pm[/size][hr]anyone? :(

item.title: [508] Max hits/Spec Damage Increase/ etc

Hi and welcome to my topic.

My problem is the following:
